description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国文化大革命时期的一个政治帮派组织，由林彪、陈伯达等人组成，被指控与江青反革命集团勾结，试图夺取最高权力并策划暗杀毛泽东。
description.en: A political faction during the Cultural Revolution in the People's Republic of China, composed of Lin Biao, Chen Boda, and others. It was accused of colluding with the Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary clique to seize supreme power and plotting to assassinate Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，被认定为林彪反党集团的首脑。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, identified as the leader of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党高级官员，林彪反党集团主犯之一。
description.en: A senior official of the Communist Party of China and one of the principal members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的妻子，林彪反党集团主犯之一。
description.en: Lin Biao's wife and one of the principal members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，林彪反党集团主犯之一。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army and one of the principal members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，林彪反党集团主犯之一。
description.en: An Air Force general of the People's Liberation Army and one of the principal members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军中将，林彪反党集团主犯之一。
description.en: A vice admiral of the People's Liberation Army Navy and one of the principal members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，林彪反党集团主犯之一。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army and one of the principal members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 林彪之子，林彪反党集团成员。
description.en: Son of Lin Biao and a member of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期的另一个主要政治集团，后被称为“四人帮”。
description.en: Another major political faction during the Cultural Revolution, later known as the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 林彪反党集团被指控策划的武装政变计划，其内容包括暗杀毛泽东。
description.en: An armed coup plan allegedly masterminded by the Lin Biao anti-party clique, which included the assassination of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 指1971年9月13日林彪、叶群、林立果等人乘飞机出逃，最终在蒙古温都尔汗坠机身亡的事件。该事件标志着林彪反党集团的覆灭。
description.en: Refers to the event on September 13, 1971, where Lin Biao, Ye Qun, Lin Liguo, and others fled by plane, which crashed in Öndörkhaan, Mongolia, resulting in their deaths. This event marked the demise of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 拥有土地等生产资料，并依靠出租土地、雇佣劳动或放高利贷为生的社会阶级。
description.en: A social class that owns means of production such as land and lives by renting out land, hiring labor, or usury.

description.zh-cn: 在资本主义社会中占有生产资料的社会阶级。
description.en: The social class that owns the means of production in a capitalist society.

description.zh-cn: 政治术语，指反对进步、历史潮流或革命的力量或派别。
description.en: A political term referring to forces or factions that oppose progress, historical trends, or revolution.

description.zh-cn: 马克思主义理论中的一个概念，指由无产阶级掌握的国家政权。
description.en: A concept in Marxist theory referring to state power held by the proletariat.

description.zh-cn: 林彪被认定为林彪反党集团的首要分子。
description.en: Lin Biao was identified as the leader of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 陈伯达是林彪反党集团的主要成员之一。
description.en: Chen Boda was one of the main members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 叶群是林彪反党集团的主要成员之一。
description.en: Ye Qun was one of the main members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 黄永胜是林彪反党集团的主要成员之一。
description.en: Huang Yongsheng was one of the main members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 吴法宪是林彪反党集团的主要成员之一。
description.en: Wu Faxian was one of the main members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 李作鹏是林彪反党集团的主要成员之一。
description.en: Li Zuopeng was one of the main members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 邱会作是林彪反党集团的主要成员之一。
description.en: Qiu Huizuo was one of the main members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 林立果是林彪反党集团的成员之一。
description.en: Lin Liguo was one of the members of the Lin Biao anti-party clique.

description.zh-cn: 中共指控林彪反党集团与江青反革命集团在文革期间相互勾结，以图夺取中国的最高权力。
description.en: The CPC accused the Lin Biao anti-party clique of colluding with the Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary clique during the Cultural Revolution in an attempt to seize the supreme power of China.

description.zh-cn: 林彪反党集团策划了旨在杀害毛泽东的《五七一工程纪要》计划。
description.en: The Lin Biao anti-party clique masterminded the 'Project 571 Outline' plan, which aimed to assassinate Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 《五七一工程纪要》是一个旨在杀害毛泽东的武装政变计划。
description.en: The 'Project 571 Outline' was an armed coup plan aimed at assassinating Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 林彪在九一三事件中因飞机失事坠毁于蒙古人民共和国温都尔汗而身亡。
description.en: Lin Biao died in the September 13 Incident when his plane crashed in Öndörkhaan, Mongolian People's Republic.

description.zh-cn: 九一三事件导致林彪集团核心成员死亡或被捕，集团被彻底粉碎。
description.en: The September 13 Incident led to the death or arrest of the core members of the Lin Biao clique, resulting in its complete dismantlement.

description.zh-cn: 根据官方定性，林彪反党集团试图推翻无产阶级专政、复辟资产阶级专政。
description.en: According to the official verdict, the Lin Biao anti-party clique attempted to overthrow the dictatorship of the proletariat and restore the dictatorship of the bourgeoisie.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间的评价认为，林彪反党集团代表了被打倒的地主阶级的利益。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, it was assessed that the Lin Biao anti-party clique represented the interests of the overthrown landlord class.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间的评价认为，林彪反党集团代表了被打倒的资产阶级的利益。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, it was assessed that the Lin Biao anti-party clique represented the interests of the overthrown bourgeoisie.

description.zh-cn: 文革期间的评价认为，林彪反党集团代表了被打倒的反动派的愿望。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, it was assessed that the Lin Biao anti-party clique represented the wishes of the overthrown reactionaries.

description.zh-cn: 林彪反党集团是在文化大革命的政治背景下形成和活动的。
description.en: The Lin Biao anti-party clique was formed and active within the political context of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 该集团被中华人民共和国官方定性为“反党集团”和“反革命集团”。
description.en: The clique was officially designated as an 'anti-party clique' and 'counter-revolutionary clique' by the People's Republic of China.
